caption: Figure 1. Dependency graph of the LabelMakerv2 pipeline.
description: The figure shows the dependency graph of the LabelMakerv2 pipeline which includes data preprocessing, base models, consensus, point lifting, and video visualization.
section: 3.2. Improving Labelmaker to make it scale to ARKitScenes [4]

caption: Figure 2. Self-captured scenes and the semantic segmentation generated by LabelMakerv2. This figure shows visually appealing segmentation results, therefore illustrates the effectiveness of our pipeline. The color mapping is defined in original LabelMaker's repository.
description: Figure 2 shows two examples of self-captured scenes and their corresponding semantic segmentations generated using the LabelMakerv2 pipeline, demonstrating the pipeline's effectiveness.
